sense.gloss: container of fresh water for replenishing the kettle and rinsing bowls (tea ceremony)

sdata.j: ↑水差↑↓|みずさ↓し|の↑取↑↓と↓っ↑手↑↓て↓が↑壊↑↓こわ↓れた。
sdata.e: The handle of the pitcher was broken.

sdata.j: ↑花↑↓はな↓、↑元気↑↓げんき↓ないわね。↑水↑↓みず↓をやりたいんだけど、↑水差↑↓|みずさし|↓しない？
sdata.e: The flowers don't look happy. I'd like to water them. Is there a watering can?

sdata.j: ↑花↑↓はな↓、↑元気↑↓げんき↓ないわね。↑水↑↓みず↓をやりたいんだけど、↑水差↑↓|みずさし|↓しない？
sdata.e: The flowers don't look well. I'd like to water them. Is there a watering can?
